description: Manage the manufacturing state of attached devices.

commands.name: az sphere device manufacturing-state show
commands.summary: Show the manufacturing state of the attached device.

commands.name: az sphere device manufacturing-state update
commands.summary: Update the manufacturing state of the attached device. Caution: manufacturing state changes are permanent and irreversible.
commands.syntax:
az sphere device manufacturing-state update --state {DeviceComplete, Module1Complete}
                                            [--device]
examples: az sphere device manufacturing-state update --state DeviceComplete
az sphere device manufacturing-state update --state DeviceComplete --device <DeviceIdValue>
